channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloudways -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloudways -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-29444|2024-08-03T06:26:04.876Z -- cloudways -- breeze%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Plugin Settings Change leading to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Cloudways Breeze plugin <= 2.0.2 on WordPress allows users with a subscriber or higher user role to execute any of the wp_ajax_* actions in the class Breeze_Configuration which includes the ability to change any of the plugin's settings including CDN setting which could be further used for XSS attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-27188|2024-08-02T00:27:59.868Z -- cloudways -- breeze
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Cloudways Breeze allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Breeze: from n/a through 2.1.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-27188|2024-03-27T06:35:38.045Z -- cloudways -- breeze
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Cloudways Breeze allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Breeze: from n/a through 2.1.3.
